com.samysadi.acs.core.tracing

Interface ModifiableProbe<ValueType>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Notifier, Probe<ValueType>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IncrementableProbe<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CpBwCloudProbe, CpDownBwInternetProbe, CpFailedHostsCountProbe, CpHostsPowerProbe, CpMipsProbe, CpStorageTrProbe, CpUpBwInternetProbe, CpUserBillingProbe, CustomProbe, JobDownBwCloudProbe, JobDownBwInternetProbe, JobUpBwCloudProbe, JobUpBwInternetProbe, SimCompletedWorkloadsCountProbe, SimFailedWorkloadsCountProbe, SimSubmittedWorkloadsCountProbe

    public interface ModifiableProbe<ValueType>
extends Probe<ValueType>
    This interface defines a modifiable Probe.
    Such probes' value can be updated through other objects.

    Unlike other Probes, you don't need to register listeners to update this probe's value. But you can instead rely on updates from other Probes for instance.

    Since:
    1.0
